choices: Look down to where your sisters room.
1.content:
As nick was sitting on his bed on Saturday evening when all of a sudden he heard a voice.
"Yo I'm just a passing voice I looked into you brain a bit and saw you interests so I guess I will give you this cool ability that I have laying around. It's perfect for you you closet pervert, it's the ability to project your body in what ever direction you are looking but it can only send your soul up to thirty feat."

"Wait but how do I return to my body and are you a god or something?"

"You can just return to you body if you focus and to answer your second question I am not a god I am simply a traveling voice."

"Wait that's your answer I doubt your just some voice but really a god or something."

"Think what ever you want I'm leaving I will probably not talk to you again since you like to ask so many questions so later."

"WAIT YOU STUPID VOICE."

"..."

"Now I guess I should test out this power."
1.title: Beginning

11.content:
Not thinking much of it you test out your power looking forward.
Suddenly you felt a emptiness as your power activated then everything came back just as soon as it left but something felt off.
As your senses where coming back your lower body felt hot and as your vision focused in you saw your neighbor Ryan above you.
Suddenly letting out a moan you put everything together, you where in your neighbors wife Sally and you where being penetrated by your neighbor Ryan.
"AHH" letting out a scream as suddenly you felt something warm entering you and you passed out.

Waking up you looked around only to notice your neighbor sleeping next to you.

"What why is... oh right I'm in Sally's body right now."

Looking down confirmed it to large mound obscuring your view with a blanket over them.

'Well I was not expecting that on my first test of this power guess I should know what the person is doing before using my ability otherwise this might happen again."

"Well Ryan is sleeping right so I could explore or I can just return to my body since this body is feeling tired."
11.title: Look forward

info.brief_description: Nick is a closet pervert who one day gets the ability to project himself into people.
info.description:
-Ability: Nick can project his soul out up to thirty feat in what ever direction his eyes are looking. He shoots out a his soul and it will posses any person or animal that comes into contact with it. His soul only travels in a straight line and can go through walls. To leave a host he needs to focus one leaving and the he returns to his body. His body goes on auto pilot and does not know what is happening. Host doesn't remember anything.

-Nick(18): A closet pervert who gets a power that lets his fantasies of possessing others come true. He is 5'6" and is jokingly mocked by his twin sister who is a little bit taller. Has black short hair, green eyes, and a medium build.

-Alice(18):Nick's twin sister. Long black hair, green eyes, and medium chest.

-Beth(37):Nicks Mother. Long blond hair, green eyes, curvy build, large chest.

-Mark(40):Nicks Father. Short black hair blue eyes, muscular build.

Rule:
-Nick can never get stuck(unless his original body dies then the current body becomes his new body.)
